articles.author: TRTWorld
articles.title: Zoos hide birds as avian flu sweeps North America - TRT World
articles.description: So far no outbreaks have been reported at zoos, but there have been wild birds found dead that had highly contagious and potentially deadly avian influenza.
articles.content:
So far no outbreaks have been reported at zoos, but there have been wild birds found dead that had highly contagious and potentially deadly avian influenza.
